div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 120px; margin-left: 1px;

div.div:
Functional Requirments
1. put(key,value)
2.get(key)
3. Size of Key/Value is less than 10 KB
4. Ability to Store more Dara

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 230px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Non Functional Requirements
1. Scalable
2. Availability
3. Durability
4. Eventual Consistency

3. Whenever Server boots up, it reads from the disk
4. User request get/put from in memory

div.div: Request lands to whichever node that is in rhe proximity of the server
Gossip Protocol - To replicate data amongst the nodes
W means --> Write successful for a operatiuon
R-> Read succesful for a operation

switch.text: Request lands to whichever node that is in rhe...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 412px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1005px; margin-left: 1005px;

div.div: 1. what if modifications happen to same key --> but they reached in different time
1. versioning associated with the request --> associate a version or timestamp on when the request reached the API-Gateway
2. So Data is written to these nodes
2. Distribute Data across the circle via virtual indexing
i The next node can serve the request
4. Bloom Filter is used to check if a node of SSTable -->Sorted String Table has a specific key

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 422px; height: 1px; padding-top: 214px; margin-left: 1005px;

div.p: Append file to log every request
2. Hash for a Key is computed
3. Bits for the hash are set to 1
4. With every get Request we check if all bits are 1
if yes --> Key exists in the node
Issue with Bloom Filters might be false positives --> but still efficient

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
